# EnumHelper.CreateListFromEnumValuesValues&lt;T&gt; method

Returns a IEnumerable that contains enum values of enumerated type as integer values.

```csharp
public static IEnumerable<int> CreateListFromEnumValuesValues<T>()
```

## Return Value

A new IEnumerable that contains enum values of enumerated type as integer values.
